articles.description: Patrick Mahomes again showed why he could chase down Tom Brady's records as he led the Kansas City Chiefs to back-to-back Super Bowl wins - and they believe glory can be theirs again next year.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2024: Patrick Mahomes steps up Tom Brady chase as leader of NFL's new dynasty

articles.description: Marathon world record holder Kelvin Kiptum was a "special talent" who would gone on to have an "incredible career", says Sir Mo Farah.
articles.title: Kelvin Kiptum dies: Sir Mo Farah says Kenyan was a 'special talent'

articles.description: Watch the Kansas City Chiefs celebrate after beating the San Francisco 49ers 25-22 in overtime to win their third Super Bowl in five years.
articles.title: Watch Chiefs celebrate Super Bowl win over 49ers

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she "struggled with everything" as she was beaten by world number 30 Anhelina Kalinina in the first round of the Qatar Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu beaten by Anhelina Kalinina in first round of Qatar Open

articles.description: Taylor Swift flies back from Tokyo to watch boyfriend Travis Kelce win the Super Bowl - what difference did it make?
articles.title: Taylor Swift at Super Bowl 58: How did pop star's attendance influence the NFL's big game

articles.description: India batter KL Rahul will miss the third Test against England at Rajkot with injury.
articles.title: Injured Rahul ruled out of third Test v England

articles.description: England have not beaten Scotland since 2020 and are looking to end a run of three successive defeats against their oldest rivals.
articles.title: England have to 'right some wrongs' in Scotland

articles.description: Kenyan athlete Kelvin Kiptum was on the cusp of greatness when his life was cut short in an accident.
articles.title: Kelvin Kiptum: The Kenyan marathon runner destined for greatness

articles.description: Fernando Alonso says Lewis Hamilton's move to Ferrari could turn the Italian team into championship contenders in 2025.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton move could spark Ferrari title charge in 2025, says Fernando Alonso

articles.description: Sebastien Haller fired Ivory Coast to victory in the 2023 Nations Cup final just 13 months after returning from testicular cancer.
articles.title: Afcon 2023: Sebastien Haller caps return from cancer with winner in final for Ivory Coast
